article_node.title: Trump's beef with economic data could backfire
article_node.summary: President Trump appears to be attempting to create an alternative narrative regarding the economy, potentially in response to anticipated negative trends from tariffs and economic data. Despite having some knowledgeable economists in his circle, many experts predict a slowing economy, which Trump seems to be countering by reshuffling economic leadership and questioning the validity of economic reports. The discussion highlights the disconnect between economic data and public perception, as everyday concerns about job security and living costs may overshadow statistical measures.
